words.meaning: 干净的；清洁的 v.打扫；弄干净；擦干净
光；光亮；灯；灯光 adj.轻的；浅色的
极其重要的，必不可少的
words.example: Proper preparation is essential for a successful experiment.

words.meaning: 合用；分享 n.(C)一份；股票
症状（生病时表现出来的感觉或现象）
words.example: A high fever is a common symptom of the flu.

words.meaning: 先生（对男性的称呼，Mr. 的全写）
words.example: Excuse me, Mister, you dropped your wallet.

words.meaning: n. 样本；样品；例子；v. 取样；抽样检查
words.example: This is a sample of his writing.

words.meaning: 1) general manager 总经理；2) good morning 早上好（语境决定）
words.example: GM = general manager in a company.
Jason wants to be a teacher.
They built low-cost houses for families.

words.meaning: n. 总结；概要；adj. 概括性的
words.example: Please write a short summary of the article.

words.meaning: WH-疑问词/疑问结构的统称（what/when/where/who/whose/why/how 等）
words.example: WH-words include what, where, and how.
The students are mostly quiet in class.

phrases.example: The environment is getting worse day by day.
Please speak up so everyone can hear you.

phrases.meaning: 在这篇文章里/本文中（常用于阅读理解：从文章中获取信息）
phrases.example: In this article, we learn how young people volunteer.

phrases.meaning: 从这篇文章中（强调信息来源）
phrases.example: From this article, we know Jason is 18 years old.

patterns.meaning: 强调句：强调句子中的某一成分（人/事/时间/地点/原因等）
patterns.example: It was in the summer that Alice volunteered there.
There are twelve books on the desk.

grammar.title: 主语
grammar.definition: 主语的含义
grammar.structure: 主语缺失问题

sub_topics.title: 主语缺失问题
sub_topics.definition: 英语句子必须有明确主语
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 谓语 + 宾语
usage: 不能用逗号连接两个完整句
必要时用it作形式主语
examples: It is important to protect nature.

grammar.title: 宾语
grammar.definition: 宾语
grammar.structure: 双宾语结构

sub_topics.title: 双宾语结构
sub_topics.definition: 一个动词后接两个宾语
usage: tell, teach, give常见
examples: He taught me English.

grammar.title: 动词
grammar.definition: 动词
grammar.structure: 动词

grammar.title: 现在进行时
grammar.definition: 表示现在正在进行的动作，也可表示现阶段正在进行或即将发生的动作。
grammar.structure: 主语 + am/is/are + 动词-ing
usage: 表示说话时正在进行的动作：He is reading a book now.
表示现阶段正在进行的动作：She is learning French this year.
表示即将发生的动作（常用go, come, leave等）：I am leaving tomorrow.
与always连用表示赞扬或不满：He is always helping others.

mistakes.wrong: She is play the piano.
mistakes.explanation: be动词后面要用动词的-ing形式

mistakes.wrong: I am knowing the answer.
mistakes.explanation: know是状态动词，一般不用进行时

examples: They are watching TV at the moment.
Look! The baby is crying.
We are having an English class now.

grammar.title: 现在完成时
grammar.definition: 表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或结果，也表示从过去持续到现在的动作或状态。
grammar.structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词
usage: 表示过去的动作对现在的影响：I have lost my key. (现在没有钥匙)
表示经历：Have you ever been to Beijing?
表示持续到现在的状态：I have lived here for 10 years.
常与already, yet, just, ever, never, for, since连用

mistakes.wrong: I have see the movie.
mistakes.explanation: have/has后面要用动词的过去分词形式

mistakes.wrong: I have bought this book yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: 有具体过去时间（yesterday），不能用现在完成时

mistakes.wrong: He has gone to Beijing for 3 days.
mistakes.correct: He has been in Beijing for 3 days.
mistakes.explanation: have gone表示去了还没回来，不能与for连用

examples: She has already finished her homework.
I have never met him before.
We have known each other since 2020.

grammar.title: 被动语态
grammar.definition: 当主语是动作的承受者时，使用被动语态。强调动作的承受者或动作本身。
grammar.structure: 主语 + be + 过去分词 + (by + 动作执行者)
usage: 不知道或不必说明动作执行者：The window was broken.
强调动作承受者：The book was written by Lu Xun.
客观报道或正式场合：The meeting will be held tomorrow.
各种时态的被动：is done, was done, will be done, has been done等

mistakes.wrong: The car was repair yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: be后面要用动词的过去分词

mistakes.wrong: The book is belonged to me.
mistakes.explanation: belong是不及物动词，没有被动语态

examples: English is spoken all over the world.
The bridge was built in 1990.
The work must be finished on time.

grammar.title: 一般现在时
grammar.definition: 表示经常性、习惯性的动作或状态，也用于表示客观事实、真理和现在的状态。
grammar.structure: 主语 + 动词原形（第三人称单数加-s/-es）
usage: 表示经常性或习惯性动作：I get up at 6 every day.
表示客观事实或真理：The earth goes around the sun.
表示现在的状态或特征：She looks beautiful.
在时间/条件状语从句中表将来：If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.

mistakes.wrong: He go to school every day.
mistakes.correct: He goes to school every day.
mistakes.explanation: 第三人称单数主语后，动词要加-s或-es

mistakes.wrong: She don't like apples.
mistakes.explanation: 第三人称单数的否定用doesn't，不用don't

examples: I usually have breakfast at 7:00.
She speaks English very well.
Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.

grammar.title: 一般过去时
grammar.definition: 表示过去某一时间发生的动作或存在的状态，也表示过去经常或反复发生的动作。
grammar.structure: 主语 + 动词过去式（be动词用was/were）
usage: 表示过去发生的动作：I visited my grandma yesterday.
表示过去存在的状态：He was a teacher ten years ago.
表示过去的习惯：When I was young, I often played football.

mistakes.wrong: I go to Beijing last year.
mistakes.correct: I went to Beijing last year.
mistakes.explanation: 有过去时间标志词（last year），动词要用过去式

mistakes.wrong: Did you went there?
mistakes.explanation: did后面的动词要用原形

examples: She bought a new dress yesterday.
They were happy at the party.
I didn't watch TV last night.

grammar.title: 一般将来时
grammar.definition: 表示将来某一时刻将要发生的动作或存在的状态，也表示将来经常或反复发生的动作。
grammar.structure: 主语 + will/shall + 动词原形 或 主语 + be going to + 动词原形
usage: will表示临时决定或预测：I will help you.
be going to表示计划或有迹象要发生：Look at the clouds. It's going to rain.
shall用于第一人称的提议：Shall we go now?

mistakes.wrong: I will going to school.
mistakes.explanation: will后面直接加动词原形，不加to或-ing

mistakes.wrong: She is go to leave.
mistakes.explanation: be going to结构中，be动词后接going

examples: We will have a meeting tomorrow.
I'm going to visit my uncle next week.
It will be sunny this afternoon.

grammar.title: 过去进行时
grammar.definition: 表示过去某一时刻或某段时间正在进行的动作。
grammar.structure: 主语 + was/were + 动词-ing
usage: 表示过去某时正在进行的动作：I was sleeping at 9 last night.
描述故事背景：The sun was shining and the birds were singing.
与when/while连用：I was doing homework when mom came back.

mistakes.wrong: I was watch TV at 8 yesterday.
mistakes.correct: I was watching TV at 8 yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: was/were后要用动词-ing形式

mistakes.wrong: While I did homework, he was playing.
mistakes.correct: While I was doing homework, he was playing.
mistakes.explanation: while引导的从句常用进行时

examples: She was cooking when the phone rang.
What were you doing at this time yesterday?
They were playing basketball at 4 p.m.

grammar.title: 过去完成时
grammar.definition: 表示在过去某一时间或动作之前已经完成的动作，即'过去的过去'。
grammar.structure: 主语 + had + 过去分词
usage: 表示过去某时之前完成的动作：By the time I arrived, he had left.
在宾语从句中表示更早的过去：He said he had seen the film.
常与by, before, after, when等连用

mistakes.wrong: After he had left, I arrived.
mistakes.explanation: after/before引导的从句中，过去完成时可省略

mistakes.wrong: I had finished homework yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: 没有'过去的过去'参照，用一般过去时

examples: When I got home, my parents had already had dinner.
She said she had never been abroad.
I had learned 1000 words before I entered middle school.

grammar.title: 一般疑问句
grammar.definition: 用yes或no回答的疑问句，通常将助动词、be动词或情态动词放在主语前。
grammar.structure: 助动词/Be动词/情态动词 + 主语 + 动词(原形) + 其他?
usage: be动词开头：Are you a student? — Yes, I am. / No, I'm not.
助动词开头：Do you like English? — Yes, I do. / No, I don't.
情态动词开头：Can you swim? — Yes, I can. / No, I can't.
回答要与问句保持一致

mistakes.wrong: Does he likes music?
mistakes.explanation: does后面动词要用原形

mistakes.wrong: Are you a teacher? — Yes, you are.
mistakes.correct: Are you a teacher? — Yes, I am.
mistakes.explanation: 回答时主语要变换，you变I

mistakes.wrong: Do you can swim?
mistakes.explanation: 情态动词can不能与do连用

examples: Is she your sister? — Yes, she is.
Did you finish your homework? — No, I didn't.
Will it rain tomorrow? — Maybe.

grammar.title: 特殊疑问句
grammar.definition: 用特殊疑问词（what, who, where, when, why, how等）提问的句子，不能用yes或no回答。
grammar.structure: 特殊疑问词 + 一般疑问句语序（疑问词作主语时除外）
usage: what问什么：What is your name?
who问谁：Who is that man? / Who(m) did you see?
where问地点：Where do you live?
when问时间：When did you arrive?
why问原因：Why are you late?
how问方式/程度：How do you go to school? / How old are you?

mistakes.wrong: What you want?
mistakes.explanation: 特殊疑问句需要助动词（疑问词作主语时除外）

mistakes.wrong: Who did break the window?
mistakes.explanation: who作主语时，不需要助动词did

mistakes.wrong: How many book do you have?
mistakes.correct: How many books do you have?
mistakes.explanation: how many后面要用可数名词复数

examples: What time does the movie start?
Who teaches you English?
How often do you exercise?

grammar.title: 否定句
grammar.definition: 表示否定意义的句子
grammar.structure: be not / do not
usage: 注意助动词
examples: He does not like milk.

grammar.title: 宾语从句
grammar.definition: 在复合句中作宾语的从句，通常放在主句谓语动词、介词或形容词之后。
grammar.structure: 主句 + 引导词(that/wh-/if/whether) + 陈述语序
usage: that引导（可省略）：I think (that) he is right.
wh-词引导：I don't know what his name is.
if/whether引导：I wonder if/whether he will come.
注意宾语从句要用陈述语序

mistakes.wrong: I don't know where is he.
mistakes.correct: I don't know where he is.
mistakes.explanation: 宾语从句要用陈述语序，不用疑问语序

mistakes.wrong: He asked me that where I lived.
mistakes.correct: He asked me where I lived.
mistakes.explanation: 特殊疑问词引导时不需要that

mistakes.wrong: I wonder if will he come.
mistakes.correct: I wonder if he will come.
mistakes.explanation: if引导的宾语从句要用陈述语序

examples: I believe that you can do it.
Could you tell me how I can get to the station?
I'm not sure whether it will rain tomorrow.

grammar.title: 定语
grammar.definition: 定语
grammar.structure: 后置定语

sub_topics.title: 后置定语
sub_topics.definition: 修饰名词且放在名词之后
usage: 多用于复杂修饰
examples: the students in the room
the book that I bought

grammar.title: 定语从句
grammar.definition: 在复合句中修饰名词或代词的从句，通常紧跟在被修饰的词（先行词）之后。
grammar.structure: 先行词 + 关系词(who/which/that/whose/where/when) + 从句
usage: who/that指人：The man who/that is talking is my father.
which/that指物：The book which/that I bought is interesting.
whose表所属：The girl whose mother is a doctor is my friend.
where指地点：This is the school where I studied.
when指时间：I still remember the day when I met you.

mistakes.wrong: The man which is talking is my teacher.
mistakes.correct: The man who/that is talking is my teacher.
mistakes.explanation: 先行词是人时，用who或that，不用which

mistakes.wrong: The book who I bought is good.
mistakes.correct: The book which/that I bought is good.
mistakes.explanation: 先行词是物时，用which或that，不用who

mistakes.wrong: This is the place where I visited.
mistakes.correct: This is the place which/that I visited.
mistakes.explanation: visit是及物动词，需要宾语，用which/that而非where

examples: I have a friend who can speak five languages.
The movie that we saw last night was exciting.
I'll never forget the day when I graduated.

grammar.title: 谓语
grammar.definition: 句子中说明主语“做什么/怎么样”的部分，核心通常是动词或动词短语。
grammar.structure: 主语 + 谓语（动词/系动词+表语/助动词+动词）
usage: 谓语必须与主语的人称、数、时态等一致。
一个简单句通常只有一个主要谓语动词。
系动词(be/become/seem等)+表语也构成谓语部分。
examples: He studies every day.
Protecting the environment becomes important.
She is happy.

grammar.title: 名词
grammar.definition: 表示人、事物、地点、抽象概念等的词。句子中常作主语、宾语、表语等。
grammar.structure: 单数名词/复数名词/不可数名词；可与限定词(a/the/this/my等)搭配
usage: 可数名词单数通常需要限定词：a book/the book/my book。
复数名词一般加-s/-es：books, classes。
不可数名词不加复数：information, water（可用量词表达：a piece of information）。
examples: The book is new.
I need some information.
Reading books helps us.

grammar.title: 第三人称单数
grammar.definition: 一般现在时中，当主语是第三人称单数（he/she/it/单个名词/不可数名词/一件事）时，谓语动词用“三单形式”。
grammar.structure: 主语(三单) + 动词三单形式（-s/-es/变化）
usage: he/she/it + v-s：works, likes。
以-s/-x/-sh/-ch/-o结尾多加-es：watches, goes。
辅音+y结尾变y为i加-es：studies。
be动词：is；have：has。
examples: He goes to school.
The oven tells us the time.
Protecting the environment becomes important.

grammar.title: 动名词
grammar.definition: 动词+ing 形式，当作名词使用，可作主语、宾语、表语等。
grammar.structure: V-ing（可带宾语/状语，形成短语：reading books, protecting the environment）
usage: 作主语：Reading helps us.
作介词宾语：without saying anything.
作动词宾语（部分动词后）：enjoy doing, finish doing。
examples: Reading books makes us better.
He left without saying goodbye.
Protecting the environment is important.

grammar.title: 从句
grammar.definition: 包含主语和谓语的“句中句”，在大句中充当某种成分（名词/形容词/副词的作用）。
grammar.structure: 连接词/关系词 + 从句（that/what/when/where/who/which等）
usage: 宾语从句：I know that he is right.
定语从句：families that are not rich。
状语从句：When he comes, tell me.
examples: We know (that) Jason is 18.
The boy who helped me is Jason.
When we go out, we turn off the lights.

grammar.title: 强调句
grammar.definition: 用 it is/was ... that ... 来强调句子中的某一成分，使信息更突出。
grammar.structure: It is/was + 被强调部分 + that + 其他部分
usage: 强调人：It is Tom that/who did it.
强调时间/地点/原因等：It was yesterday that we met.
被强调部分可以是主语/宾语/状语等，但不能强调谓语动词本身。
examples: It was in the summer that Alice volunteered there.
It is my brother that helped me.
It was because of rain that we stayed home.

grammar.title: 并列句（连接词and）
grammar.definition: 用并列连词把两个结构相同或意义并列的成分/句子连接起来，表达并列、顺承等关系。
grammar.structure: 句子1 + and + 句子2（或 词/短语 + and + 词/短语）
usage: 连接两个完整句子时，前后都应语法完整。
并列主语：Tom and I are friends.
并列谓语/宾语：He cleaned the room and washed the dishes.
examples: We should protect the environment, and it can make our life better.
I bought a book and read it.
Tom and Mary are classmates.

grammar.title: 过去式
grammar.definition: 动词的过去时形式，用于表示过去发生的动作或状态（一般过去时）。
grammar.structure: 规则：V-ed；不规则：go-went, eat-ate 等
usage: 明确过去时间：yesterday/last week/in 2020。
叙述过去一连串动作：He came, saw, and left。
examples: I ate rice yesterday.
He visited his friend last Sunday.
They went to the park.

grammar.title: 过去分词
grammar.definition: 动词的第三形式，常用于完成时、被动语态，也可作形容词。
grammar.structure: 规则：V-ed；不规则：eat-eaten, speak-spoken 等
usage: 完成时：have/has + 过去分词。
被动：be + 过去分词。
形容词用法：a broken window。
examples: I have done my homework.
The apple is eaten by me.
A written report is helpful.

grammar.title: 将来进行时
grammar.definition: 表示将来某一时间正在进行的动作。
grammar.structure: will be + V-ing
usage: 强调将来某时正在进行：this time tomorrow/at 8 p.m. tomorrow。
用于礼貌询问或安排：Will you be using the computer tonight?
examples: I will be studying at 8 p.m. tomorrow.
They will be traveling next week.

grammar.title: 将来完成时
grammar.definition: 表示到将来某一时间为止已经完成的动作。
grammar.structure: will have + 过去分词
usage: 常与 by + 将来时间 搭配：by next year/by 8 p.m.。
强调“到那时已经……”。
examples: By next week, I will have finished the project.
She will have left by 6 p.m.

grammar.title: 过去将来时
grammar.definition: 站在过去的时间点看“将来”，常用于间接引语或过去语境中的计划/预测。
grammar.structure: would + 动词原形（或 was/were going to + 动词原形）
usage: 间接引语：He said he would come.
过去计划：I was going to call you.
examples: He said he would help me.
We were going to have a picnic, but it rained.

grammar.title: 形容词
grammar.definition: 修饰名词或作表语，说明人/事物“怎么样”。
grammar.structure: adj + n.；be/系动词 + adj
usage: 前置定语：a low-cost house。
表语：The house is low-cost.
比较：more and more + adj 表示越来越……。
examples: This is a low-cost house.
The experiment is successful.
It is more and more important.

grammar.title: 介词
grammar.definition: 表示名词/代词与其他词的关系（时间、地点、方式、对象等），后面必须接名词性成分。
grammar.structure: prep + n./pron./V-ing/从句（少数情况）
usage: 介词后接名词或动名词：without water / without saying a word。
常见：in/on/at/for/from/with/without/to/by。
examples: From this article, we know the answer.
He left without saying goodbye.
She talked with me in the classroom.

grammar.title: 固定搭配
grammar.definition: 常用且结构固定的词组/搭配，介词或词形通常不能随意更换。
grammar.structure: 动词+介词/副词；形容词+介词；固定句型等
usage: learn about / talk with / turn off 等需要记固定介词。
考试常考：ask sb. to do sth., spend time doing sth.。
examples: talk with somebody
turn off the light
ask somebody to do something

grammar.title: 助动词
grammar.definition: 帮助主要动词构成疑问、否定、时态、语态等的词，本身通常不表示完整动作。
grammar.structure: do/does/did；have/has/had；will/would；be（在被动/进行中也可作助动）
usage: 一般现在/过去的疑问否定：Do/Does/Did + V原形。
完成时：have/has + 过去分词。
将来：will + V原形。
examples: Do you like it?
He does not know.
They have finished.

grammar.title: be动词
grammar.definition: 表示“是/在/成为/状态”的动词，也是进行时、被动语态的重要组成部分。
grammar.structure: am/is/are（现在）；was/were（过去）；be/been/being（其他形式）
usage: 系动词：She is a teacher.
进行时：be + V-ing。
被动：be + 过去分词。
examples: I am Jim.
They are reading.
The house is built.

grammar.title: 选择疑问句
grammar.definition: 在两个或多个选项中让对方选择回答的疑问句。
grammar.structure: 一般疑问句 + or + 选项2（+ ...）
usage: 回答不能用Yes/No，通常用所选项回答。
语调：or 前一般升调，or 后降调。
examples: Is this an apple or an orange?
Do you want tea or coffee?

grammar.title: 介词短语作后置定语
grammar.definition: 介词短语放在名词后面修饰该名词，相当于“……的”。
grammar.structure: 名词 + 介词短语（in/on/with/of...）
usage: 名词后信息较多时常用后置：the apple on the tree。
避免歧义：短语放前面可能不清楚修饰谁。
examples: the book on the desk
the students in this class
the apple on the tree

grammar.title: 双宾语
grammar.definition: 一个动词后面接两个宾语：一个通常是人（间接宾语），一个是物/内容（直接宾语）。
grammar.structure: V + 间接宾语(sb.) + 直接宾语(sth.)；或 V + 直接宾语 + to/for + sb.
usage: 常见动词：tell, give, show, teach, send。
可改写：tell me the news = tell the news to me。
examples: Tell me the answer.
He gave her a book.
The teacher teaches us English.

grammar.title: 不定式
grammar.definition: to + 动词原形（有时可省 to），可作名词/形容词/副词等功能，常表目的、计划、将来等。
grammar.structure: to do（否定：not to do）
usage: ask/invite/tell sb. to do sth.：要求/邀请/告诉某人去做某事。
作目的：to save energy。
与形式主语：It is + adj. + to do。
examples: We should protect the environment.
He asked me to help him.
It is important to prepare well.

grammar.title: see sb. do sth.
grammar.definition: 强调“看见某人做某事（全过程/完整发生）”。
grammar.structure: see + 宾语(sb.) + 动词原形
usage: 多表示动作从头到尾或完整发生。
类似感官动词：hear/watch/notice。
examples: I saw him leave the room.
We saw the boy speak English fluently.

grammar.title: see sb. doing sth.
grammar.definition: 强调“看见某人正在做某事（动作正在进行/片段）”。
grammar.structure: see + 宾语(sb.) + V-ing
usage: 强调当时正在发生或看到一部分过程。
与 do 形式对比：do=全过程；doing=正在进行。
examples: I saw him leaving the room.
She saw the kids playing outside.

grammar.title: do/does/did + 主语 + 动词原形 + ...?
grammar.definition: 一般疑问句（实义动词句）的基本结构，用于提问，时态由 do/does/did 决定。
grammar.structure: Do/Does/Did + 主语 + 动词原形 + ...?
usage: 一般现在时：Do/Does（第三人称单数用Does）。
一般过去时：Did（后面动词还原原形）。
简答：Yes, I do. / No, he doesn’t. / Yes, they did. 等。
examples: Do you like apples?
Does he go to school by bike?
Did you finish your homework?

grammar.title: be动词/am/is/are + 主语 + ...?
grammar.definition: be动词句的一般疑问句：把 be 动词提前即可。
grammar.structure: Am/Is/Are + 主语 + ...?
usage: 现在时：am/is/are；过去时：was/were。
简答：Yes, I am. / No, he isn’t. 等。
examples: Are you ready?
Is this your book?
Were they at home yesterday?

grammar.title: have/has + 主语 + 过去分词 + ...?
grammar.definition: 现在完成时的一般疑问句：把 have/has 提前，表示“是否已经……”。
grammar.structure: Have/Has + 主语 + 过去分词 + ...?
usage: 主语三单用 Has。
常见时间副词：already/just/yet/ever/never。
简答：Yes, I have. / No, she hasn’t. 等。
examples: Have you finished your homework?
Has he ever been to Beijing?

grammar.title: spend + time/money + (in) doing sth.
grammar.definition: 表示“花费时间/金钱做某事”。
grammar.structure: spend + 时间/钱 + (in) doing sth.
usage: 时间：spend two hours (in) reading。
钱：spend 50 dollars (in) buying a book。
不要用不定式：spend time to do（考试常判错）。
examples: They spend a lot of time helping others.
I spent two hours (in) doing my homework.
She spends money (in) buying books.

grammar.title: 用于否定句或否定短语
grammar.definition: (两者中)任何一方(的);两者之一的 pron.(两者中)任何一方；两者之一 adv.(用于否定句或否定短语)也(不)

grammar.title: 形容词比较级的递进表达
grammar.definition: 越来越……（形容词比较级的递进表达）

grammar.title: 双宾语结构
grammar.definition: 告诉某人某事（双宾语结构）

grammar.title: 疑问句
grammar.definition: 选择疑问句：在两个选项中进行选择
